member.name: T:Task1.StringHelper
member.summary: Class that contains operations on strings.

member.name: M:Task1.StringHelper.GetVowelCount(System.String)
member.summary: Counts the number a, e, i, o, and u of in the string.
member.param: String that consists of lower case letters and/or spaces.
member.returns: Number of vowels in the given string.
